name: Rig Wreckening
description:
A vampire helicopter has arrived out of nowhere to ruin your day. And your rig. Collect leftover coins spread around its platforms and kick your security turrets back into working order while the very structure crumbles and sinks all around you!

Controls:

• WSAD to move

• Spacebar to jump

• LMB to punch air

Turrets are repaired automatically when you come close!
